text: The flag of Malta is a vertical bicolor of white and red, with the representation of the George Cross edged in red on the upper hoist side corner of the white band.Article 3 of the Constitution of Malta ==Gallery== File:George Cross Malta P1440218.jpg File:UK George Cross medal-rose- detailed.svg File:George Cross of Malta 737x737.svg ==References== Malta Category:National symbols of Malta
title: Flag of Malta
